text: The Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) is an international organisation made in 1997 in order to watch countries according to Chemical Weapons Convention. The main office of OPCW is in The Hague, Netherlands. On October 11, 2013, OPCW was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize.The Telegraph, Friday 11 October 2013 == Related pages == *Laws of war *Chemical weapon == References == == Other website == *Official site of OPCW Category:International organizations Category:1997 establishments Category:The Hague Category:Nobel Peace Prize winners Category:Chemical warfare
title: Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
